meanings.definition: Not aware of the true nature or purpose of something.
meanings.sent1: The unsuspecting child happily played in the park.
meanings.sent2: The unsuspecting tourist fell for the scam.
meanings.sent3: The unsuspecting cat chased its own tail in circles.
meanings.sent4: The unsuspecting flower bloomed in the hidden garden.
meanings.sent5: The unsuspecting student aced the surprise quiz.

meanings.sent1: The unsuspecting squirrel found a hidden stash of nuts.
meanings.sent2: The unsuspecting victim walked into the surprise party.
meanings.sent3: The unsuspecting dog wagged its tail at the approaching mailman.
meanings.sent4: The unsuspecting cloud suddenly burst with rain.
meanings.sent5: The unsuspecting driver missed the turn in the unfamiliar neighborhood.
